title.raw: Set up Goal Tracking in Google Ads

content.cxl_get_extended_main: Version 1234: Monitor the profitability of your campaigns to track how they are meeting your business objectives.

playbook_steps.title: Version 1234: In Google Ads, click on Tools and Settings and select Conversions, then click the + button.
Version 1234: Select the types of conversions that your business needs to track.
Version 1234: For website conversions: Create a conversion action by completing the prompts on the following screen.
Version 1234: Set up the tag to add to your website.
Version 1234: Create your App conversions.
Phone Calls Conversions
Go to your Conversion tab and check Tracking Status to ensure the tracking is working.
Periodically check your Conversions section to see if your goal tracking still has a status of Recording Conversions or No Recent Conversions.

content.cxl_get_extended_main: Version 33333: Connect with your audience and increase your following on Twitter.

playbook_steps.title: Version 33333: Set up a Twitter account with your complete name, a profile picture, and an attractive header image and a bio with industry-targeted keywords and social proof.
Version 33333: Participate in major and relevant Twitter chats to gain followers and use the advanced search feature to find relevant discussions
Version 33333: Use the trending tab and search function on Twitter to identify popular tweets, participate actively, connect with influencers, boost engagement, and curate content.
Version 33333: Use Tweetdeck to reach out to niche influencers and participate in their recent tweets by liking, commenting or retweeting.
Version 33333: Use Twitter Analytics to identify your top tweets and recycle them for more engagement and re-targeting.
Version 33333: Boost the reach of your top-performing tweets with Twitter ads.
Version 33333: Create a conversion funnel to warm up your Twitter traffic and build brand awareness before promoting products.
Version 33333: Create a Twitter landing page that is engaging and conversion-friendly to attract visitors and re-target them in the future.
Version 33333: Promote your Twitter landing page, schedule tweets in advance and diversify your tweet copy by doing these.
Version 33333: Engage with niche followers to grab attention, get feedback, and promote your product, using these tips

content.cxl_get_extended_main: Version 8888: Create better user experience and protect the value of your SEO efforts.

playbook_steps.title: Version 8888: Use the tool Screaming Frog to find broken internal links.
Version 8888: Create a spreadsheet using Excel or Google Sheets where you can export or copy and paste the Screaming Frog data on broken links to track your progress.
Version 8888: Determine which broken internal links are worth fixing by checking the traffic to each page in Google Analytics and record them in your spreadsheet.
Version 8888: Repair your broken internal links by redirecting them in your CMS.
Version 8888: Conduct a broken link audit on a monthly basis by repeating these steps every month.
